about_the_game:
Masternoid is a colorful arcade game for all ages that brings the timeless gameplay of old classics in the VR age, adding bombastic explosions and destructive power ups in the mix.

Travel through the voxel universe

Master the art of destruction and explore a universe of 50+ meticulously designed handcrafted levels. Collect all the stars and move through the Masternoid world where a voxel surprise awaits at every corner. Compete with friends and rise through the ranks on the leaderboards as you hone your abilities.

Arcade Means Powerups

Arm yourself with your trusty blaster and make those voxels explode. Try not to get the ball in your face and get rewarded with awesome power ups. Experience the thrill of launching a flaming ball that incinerates everything in its path, unleash a ball of lighting that sends sparks all around or harness the power of the magnet to see all those multipliers fly home and see your scores skyrocket.

Just One More Try

Masternoid features an intricate scoring system that values both consistency and rapid reflexes. Hone your voxel blasting skills, collect multipliers, juggle numerous balls, take advantage of the power-ups for maximum impact, and witness your score surge from mere thousands to millions. Engage in friendly competition with your peers and climb the leaderboard ranks like a true arcade legend.

In space no one can hear you dance

Immerse yourself in the synth-driven beats of our original soundtrack, a homage to the iconic sounds of the 80s. Experience the music dynamically shifting with your progress, unlock new tracks as you venture further into the game and reap the rewards of your journey.

There is always a reason to grab your blaster

Whether you are aiming for that elusive final star on a challenging level, looking to surpass your friends in the leaderboards, interested in exploring fresh seasonal levels, or seizing your daily opportunity in the Daily Blast, there's always a compelling reason to put your headset on and immerse yourself in the vibrant voxel world.

A Game For Everyone

Experience the world of Masternoid anyway you like. Play seated from the comfort of your sofa or standing at the center of your living room. Just relax and get through the voxel world slowly or go for the top of the leaderboards and juggle four balls at the same time. Either you are 8 or 88, Masternoid has something to offer you.

name: Masternoid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Meta Headsets and Index only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Meta Headsets and Index only

reviews:
“Just remember - you should play Masternoid!”
CrossButton VR

“Rock on! One of the best VR games out there.”
Amiga Guru

“I played @masternoid until 4 AM, and stopped only because my controllers run out of battery.”
golu78
short_description: Step into Masternoid, an electrifying arcade brick breaker designed for players of all ages. Experience the nostalgic thrill of classic gameplay, reimagined for the VR era, infused with dazzling explosions and game-changing power-ups.
